title: Domestic travel spending in France 2012 to 2028
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Spending in billion euros, with a total of 8 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2028 to 2015.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2014 to 2012.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2015 to 2014.
